summary: An ordinance amending section 1 of Ordinance No. 22395 entitled: "An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to construct a two-plank walk on Beacon Avenue from the north line of Tract "C" Sommerville Addition to the stockade, and on Juneau Street from Beacon Avenue to 28th Avenue South appropriating money therefor" approved November 16, 1909.
